title: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Taxable Income
description: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Taxable Income

summary.description: Details the high-level income for the calculation.

totalIncomeReceivedFromAllSources.title: totalIncomeReceivedFromAllSources
totalIncomeReceivedFromAllSources.description: The total income received from all income sources. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalTaxableIncome.title: totalTaxableIncome
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total income that is taxable across all income sources after allowances and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

detail.description: Details the income breakdown for the calculation.

payPensionsProfit.description: Details the income breakdown of pay, pensions and profit.

incomeReceived.title: incomeReceived
incomeReceived.description: The income received across all pay, pensions and profit sources. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The total taxable income from all pay, pensions and profit sources after allowances and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalSelfEmploymentProfit.title: totalSelfEmploymentProfit
totalSelfEmploymentProfit.description: The total self-employment profit for all self-employment businesses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalPropertyProfit.title: totalPropertyProfit
totalPropertyProfit.description: The total of the UK Property FHL and UK Property Non-FHL profits. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalFHLPropertyProfit.title: totalFHLPropertyProfit
totalFHLPropertyProfit.description: The total UK Property FHL profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalUKOtherPropertyProfit.title: totalUKOtherPropertyProfit
totalUKOtherPropertyProfit.description: The total UK Property Non-FHL profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalForeignPropertyProfit.title: totalForeignPropertyProfit
totalForeignPropertyProfit.description: The total Foreign Property Profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalEeaFhlProfit.title: totalEeaFhlProfit
totalEeaFhlProfit.description: The total EEA FHL Profit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalOccupationalPensionIncome.title: totalOccupationalPensionIncome
totalOccupationalPensionIncome.description: The total occupational pension income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalStateBenefitsIncome.title: totalStateBenefitsIncome
totalStateBenefitsIncome.description: The total state benefits income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalBenefitsInKind.title: totalBenefitsInKind
totalBenefitsInKind.description: The total benefits in kind. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalPayeEmploymentAndLumpSumIncome.title: totalPayeEmploymentAndLumpSumIncome
totalPayeEmploymentAndLumpSumIncome.description: The total PAYE employment and lump sum income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalEmploymentExpenses.title: totalEmploymentExpenses
totalEmploymentExpenses.description: The total employment expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalSeafarersDeduction.title: totalSeafarersDeduction
totalSeafarersDeduction.description: The total value of any Seafarers Deductions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalForeignTaxOnForeignEmployment.title: totalForeignTaxOnForeignEmployment
totalForeignTaxOnForeignEmployment.description: The total value of foreign tax on foreign income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalEmploymentIncome.title: totalEmploymentIncome
totalEmploymentIncome.description: The total employment and benefit income minus expenses. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalShareSchemesIncome.title: totalShareSchemesIncome
totalShareSchemesIncome.description: The total share schemes income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalOverseasPensionsStateBenefitsRoyalt.title: totalOverseasPensionsStateBenefitsRoyalties
totalOverseasPensionsStateBenefitsRoyalt.description: The total value of overseas pensions state benefits and royalties. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAllOtherIncomeReceivedWhilstAbroad.title: totalAllOtherIncomeReceivedWhilstAbroad
totalAllOtherIncomeReceivedWhilstAbroad.description: The total value of all other income received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalOverseasIncomeAndGains.title: totalOverseasIncomeAndGains
totalOverseasIncomeAndGains.description: The total value of overseas income and gains. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalForeignBenefitsAndGifts.title: totalForeignBenefitsAndGifts
totalForeignBenefitsAndGifts.description: The total value of foreign benefits and gifts. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessProfitAndLoss.description: Details the profit and loss position for business income sources.

selfEmployments.description: A list that shows the profit and loss position for each self-employment business.

selfEmploymentId.title: selfEmploymentId
selfEmploymentId.description: A unique identifier for the self-employment business income source.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income received for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses the result is displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses the result is displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions to the net profit (or deductions from the net loss) for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions from the net loss (or additions to the net profit) for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: Accounting adjustments applied to the profit or loss calculation for the self-employment business. This value must be between -999999999999.99 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit after all additions and deductions have been applied for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss after all additions and deductions have been applied for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

class4Loss.title: class4Loss
class4Loss.description: The Class 4 National Insurance Contributions loss for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsSummary.description: Summarises losses and claims for the self-employment business. This will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses brought forward from earlier years for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: This is the total sum of losses brought forward from previous years used against the taxable profit for the self-employment business for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The Income Tax losses for the self-employment business that have been carried sideways in this calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses to be carried forward that have not been used against the self-employment business profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses.title: totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses
totalBroughtForwardClass4Losses.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses brought forward from earlier years for the self-employment business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.title: broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed
broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses brought forward from earlier years that have been used against the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions for the self-employment business for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed
carrySidewaysClass4LossesUsed.description: The Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses for the self-employment business that have been carried sideways in this calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.title: totalClass4LossesCarriedForward
totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses to be carried forward that have not been used against the self-employment business profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsDetail.description: Details individual loss claims and how they have been used in the calculation for the self-employment business. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation

lossesBroughtForward.description: A list of losses brought forward into this calculation for the self-employment business.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year of the loss. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Flag indicating the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

resultOfClaimsApplied.description: A list of loss claims in this calculation for the self-employment business.

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The Claim ID of the loss.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the claim was made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of loss claim that was made.

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Flag indicating the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was incurred. Date in the format: YYYY-YY

lossAmountUsed.title: lossAmountUsed
lossAmountUsed.description: The amount of loss used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

remainingLossValue.title: remainingLossValue
remainingLossValue.description: The amount of remaining loss not used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

unclaimedLosses.description: Losses from the self-employment business from this calculation where no carry forward claim has been made

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year the loss arose. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carriedForwardLosses.description: Losses from the self-employment business from this calculation where a carry forward claim has been made

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The Claim ID of the loss.

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the claim was made. Format: YYYY-YY

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year of the loss. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

claimsNotApplied.description: Loss claims that could not be applied in this calculation for the self-employment business

claimId.title: claimId
claimId.description: The Claim ID of the loss.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade
taxYearClaimMade.description: The tax year in which the claim was made. Format: YYYY-YY

claimType.title: claimType
claimType.description: The type of claim that was made.

bsas.title: Business Source Adjustable Summary
bsas.description: Details if the amounts in a Business Source Adjustable Summary adjustment for this self-employment business have been used in this calculation.

bsasId.title: Business Source Account Summary ID
bsasId.description: The unique identifier of the Business Source Adjustable Summary for this self-employment business.

applied.title: Applied
applied.description: Flag indicating whether the amounts in the Business Source Adjustable Summary adjustment have been used in this calculation.

ukPropertyFhl.description: Details the profit and loss position for UK Property FHL.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income received for UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for UK Property FHL. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses the result will be displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses the result will be displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions to the net profit (or deductions from the net loss) for UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions from the net loss (or additions to the net profit) for the UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit after all additions and deductions have been applied for UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss after all additions and deductions have been applied for UK property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted for UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsSummary.description: Summarises losses and claims for the UK Property FHL. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation

lossForCSFHL.title: lossForCSFHL
lossForCSFHL.description: The losses from UK Property Non-FHL that have been carried sideways to UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses brought forward from earlier years for UK Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The total sum of losses brought forward from previous years used against the taxable profit for UK Property Non-FHL for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses to be carried forward that have not been used against the UK Property FHL profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsDetail.description:
Details individual loss claims and how they have been used in the calculation for the UK Property FHL.

This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

lossAmountUsed.description: The amount of loss used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

remainingLossValue.description: The amount of remaining loss not used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year of the loss. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

bsas.title: Business Source Adjustable Summary
bsas.description: Details if the amounts in a Business Source Adjustable Summary adjustment for UK Property FHL have been used in this calculation.

bsasId.description: The unique identifier of the Business Source Adjustable Summary for UK Property FHL.

applied.title: Applied
applied.description: Flag indicating whether the amounts in the Business Source Adjustable Summary adjustment have been used in this calculation.

ukPropertyNonFhl.description: Details the profit and loss position for UK Property Non-FHL.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income received for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for UK property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses the result is displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses the result is displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions to the net profit (or deductions from the net loss) for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions from the net loss (or additions to the net profit) for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: Accounting adjustments applied to the profit or loss calculation for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between -999999999999.99 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit after all additions and deductions have been applied for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss after all additions and deductions have been applied for UK property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsSummary.description: Summarises losses and claims for UK Property Non-FHL This will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.title: totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses
totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses brought forward from earlier years for UK Property Non-FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The total sum of losses brought forward from previous years used against the taxable profit for UK Property Non-FHL for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The Income Tax losses for UK Property Non-FHL that have been carried sideways in this calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses to be carried forward that have not been utilised against the UK Property Non-FHL profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLoss.title: broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLoss.description: The total sum of the carry sideways losses for UK Property Non-FHL brought forward from previous tax years. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

originatingClaimId.description: The ID of an original carry-sideways-fhl/carry-sideways claim where not all of the loss in the calculation year could be carried sideways and the resulting loss balance was carried forwards. Where a resulting carry sideways loss balance is carried forwards there will not be a new claim ID for the carried forward portion of the loss.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible Business Source Adjustable Summary related actions.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint

lossForCSFHL.description: The losses from Foreign Property that have been carried sideways to EEA Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses brought forward from earlier years for EEA Property FHL. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: This is the total sum of losses brought forward from previous years used against the taxable profit for EEA Property FHL for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses to be carried forward that have not been used against the EEA Property FHL profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossClaimsDetail.description: Details individual loss claims and how they have been used in the calculation for the EEA Property FHL. This section will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

lossesBroughtForward.description: A list of losses brought forward into this calculation for EEA Property FHL.

currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

mtdLoss.description: Flag indicating the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

resultOfClaimsApplied.description: A list of loss claims in this calculation for EEA Property FHL

claimId.description: The Claim ID of the loss.

taxYearClaimMade.title: taxYearClaimMade

mtdLoss.title: mtdLoss
mtdLoss.description: Flag indicating the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year in which the loss was incurred. Date in the format: YYYY-YY

lossAmountUsed.title: lossAmountUsed
lossAmountUsed.description: The amount of loss used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

remainingLossValue.title: remainingLossValue
remainingLossValue.description: The amount of remaining loss not used in the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

defaultCarriedForwardLosses.description: EEA Property FHL losses from this calculation that will be carried forward to the next tax year.

taxYearLossIncurred.title: taxYearLossIncurred
taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year of the loss. Format: YYYY-YY

currentLossValue.title: currentLossValue
currentLossValue.description: The current loss value. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

foreignProperty.description: Details the profit and loss position for Foreign Property.

totalIncome.title: totalIncome
totalIncome.description: The total income received for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalExpenses.title: totalExpenses
totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.title: netProfit
netProfit.description: If the total income is greater than the total expenses the result is displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.title: netLoss
netLoss.description: If the total income is less than the total expenses the result is displayed in this field. This value is between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.title: totalAdditions
totalAdditions.description: The total additions to the net profit (or deductions from the net loss) for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.title: totalDeductions
totalDeductions.description: The total deductions from the net loss (or additions to the net profit) for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

accountingAdjustments.title: accountingAdjustments
accountingAdjustments.description: Accounting adjustments applied to the profit or loss calculation for Foreign Property. This value must be between -999999999999.99 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.title: taxableProfit
taxableProfit.description: The taxable profit after all additions and deductions have been applied for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.title: adjustedIncomeTaxLoss
adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: The adjusted Income Tax loss after all additions and deductions have been applied for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.title: taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeduction
taxableProfitAfterIncomeTaxLossesDeducti.description: The taxable profit after income tax losses have been deducted for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

bsas.description: Details if the amounts in a Business Source Adjustable Summary adjustment for Foreign Property have been used in this calculation

bsasId.title: Business Source Account Summary ID
bsasId.description: The unique identifier of the Business Source Adjustable Summary for Foreign Property.

applied.title: applied
applied.description: Flag indicating whether the amounts in the Business Source Adjustable Summary adjustment have been used in this calculation.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible Business Source Adjustable Summary related actions.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

lossClaimsSummary.description: Summarises losses and claims for Foreign Property. This will only be present for a crystallisation calculation.

totalBroughtForwardIncomeTaxLosses.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses brought forward from earlier years for Foreign Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The total sum of losses brought forward from previous years used against the taxable profit for Foreign Property for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.title: carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
carrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed.description: The Income Tax losses for Foreign Property that have been carried sideways in this calculation and used against general income in this financial year. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLoss.title: broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLossesUsed
broughtForwardCarrySidewaysIncomeTaxLoss.description: The total sum of the carry sideways losses for Foreign Property brought forward from previous tax years. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.title: totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward
totalIncomeTaxLossesCarriedForward.description: The total sum of Income Tax losses to be carried forward that have not been utilised against the Foreign Property profits for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

savingsAndGains.description: Details the breakdown of taxable savings income.

incomeReceived.title: incomeReceived
incomeReceived.description: The total taxed and untaxed savings income received. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The taxable savings income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalOfAllGains.title: totalOfAllGains
totalOfAllGains.description: The total of all gains without tax paid and gains with tax paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalUkSavingsAndSecurities.title: totalUkSavingsAndSecurities
totalUkSavingsAndSecurities.description: The total value of UK Savings and UK Securities. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalUkSavingsAndGains.title: totalUkSavingsAndGains
totalUkSavingsAndGains.description: The total value of UK Savings and UK Securities. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

savingsAccountId.title: savingsAccountId
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account.

savingsAccountName.title: savingsAccountName
savingsAccountName.description: Friendly account name. Each account name added must be unique for that National Insurance number. The account name must be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Valid characters, including spaces are: ; & ' ( ) * , - . / @ £ and mixed case alphanumeric characters./@£.

grossIncome.title: grossIncome
grossIncome.description: The gross interest received from the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.title: netIncome
netIncome.description: The net interest received from the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.title: taxDeducted
taxDeducted.description: The tax deducted from the savings account (gross figure minus the net figure). The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukSecuritiesAccountId.title: ukSecuritiesAccountId
ukSecuritiesAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the UK securities account.

ukSecuritiesAccountName.title: ukSecuritiesAccountName
ukSecuritiesAccountName.description:
Friendly account name. Each account name added must be unique for that National Insurance number.

The account name must be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Valid characters, including spaces are: ; & ' ( ) * , - . / @ £ and mixed case alphanumeric characters.

grossIncome.title: grossIncome
grossIncome.description: The gross interest received from UK securities account. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.title: netIncome
netIncome.description: The net interest received from the UK securities account. The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.title: taxDeducted
taxDeducted.description: The tax deducted from the UK securities account (gross figure minus the net figure). The value must be between 0 and 999999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalGainsWithNoTaxPaidAndVoidedIsa.title: totalGainsWithNoTaxPaidAndVoidedIsa
totalGainsWithNoTaxPaidAndVoidedIsa.description: The total gains on life policies where no tax has been paid and voided ISAs. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalForeignGainsOnLifePoliciesNoTaxPaid.title: totalForeignGainsOnLifePoliciesNoTaxPaid
totalForeignGainsOnLifePoliciesNoTaxPaid.description: The total gains on foreign life policies where no tax has been paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalForeignSavingsAndGainsIncome.title: totalForeignSavingsAndGainsIncome
totalForeignSavingsAndGainsIncome.description: The total value of Foreign Savings and Gains Income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
